level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Chief of Police, in consultation with the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia and the Corporation Counsel, shall promulgate regulations to implement this subchapter within 60 days of the effective date of this act [October 4, 2000].

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-160
level.text: For Law 13-160, see notes following ยง 23-531.
